top10_tweets_like: Help me out please #rstats: When you first learned R, what was your main motivation to do so?
Can someone make an R package for the holiday season called "tuRkey" where you just enter the weight of your turkey and it tells you how long to cook it for at a given temperature? #rstats

Wow, I'd heard the hype about the #RStats apaTables package but I didn't realise HOW easy it was. It spits out APA formatted tables with literally one line of code! Plus, you can edit them afterwards in Word (e.g. make variable names non-strings).

https://t.co/ehnnvLcfZ8 https://t.co/waa43kYEsD
